title: real fun draft pick
body:
http://imgur.com/Upfiby8

it took 11 minutes to find a match

replies.body:
This one time I got a can of peanuts and they were all stale.

I just thought you'd want to know that.
so was the post in general :)

the point is that the estimated wait time is usually a min or two off but 11 minutes is too long.
Hence, fix this shit
What do you think they should do to fix it? Hm? Including an idea to your point may make it more useful. There are plenty of complain threads about the long queue times.
i just don't see why people down vote AND HATE SO MUCH, it's just something i found funny.
Because it was a pretty pointless post because there are already very many QQ threads clogging up the boards about the queue times.
And you're playing with a premade duo, of whom the both of you with completely different Primary & Secondary picks. Of course it's gonna take a long time to find a match that suits your needs.
